hard_constraints.description: Inventory management policy requires that every individual item must be assigned to exactly one container to ensure total accountability.
Safety and weight compliance rules dictate that the total cost sum of items within any single bin must not exceed the maximum capacity threshold 'n'.
hard_constraints.asp_rule: bin(B) :- bin(B, _). weight(B, T) :- T = #sum{C, I : bin(B, I), item(I, C)}, bin(B). :- weight(B, W), W > n.

soft_constraints.description: To maximize operational efficiency and resource utilization, the system must minimize the total number of bins used according to cost-reduction policies.
